snippet.title: Case Closed: The Mirapolis Investigation
snippet.description: Case Closed, also known as Detective Conan, is one of Japans most successful anime series. The game has been developed with manga style cartoon animation and is the first anime police investigation game for kids on the Nintendo Wii.
